body.name: Small Memory Foam Pillow for Travel and Camping - Compressible Medium Firm, Contoured Support, Breathable Cover, Machine Washable, Ideal Backpacking, Airplane and Car
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 8 mins
features: VERSATILE: Lightweight, compressible and self-inflatable pillow perfect for camping, hiking, beach, airplane, car travel
DURABLE & WASHABLE: Removable bamboo-derived viscose rayon and polyester cover is machine washable
BREATHABLE: Hypoallergenic memory foam and ventilated cover prevent overheating and allergens
EASY TO CARRY: Comes with snap loop to attach to luggage and compact travel bag
SWEAT-RESISTANT: Heat-regulating fibers maintain ideal temperature; ventilation holes improve airflow

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our CertiPUR-US foam is ideal for allergy sufferers or anyone with sensitivities to natural fillings. Purpose-built to the highest standards, it contains no harmful ingredients. The hygienic, breathable viscose made from bamboo cover unzips and is machine washable for easy maintenance. Better muscle support provides relief from soreness, stiffness and nagging aches. Sleep comfortably for longer periods with less tossing and turning or restlessness. Feel those pressure points vanish and restless muscles relax. More stationary sleep is good for you and more peaceful for your bedmate. Improved sleeping positions can also open airways and help to reduce the duration and volume of snoring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Small, but comfy!Great for long travels.Couldn’t be happier with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: was exactly what I needed to put under my hip bones as added padding when I lay on my side, because my sharp bony hips and pelvis get bruised from hoe much they jut out. this isthe perfect size, comfy and soft and added cushioning without being too thick. also a great head pillow if you have neck issues I'd think.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really rolls up for transport
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great lil memory foam pillow. But unlike some others it’s easy to roll up and put into its sleeve ! Even with my pretty pillow case on it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, perfect size for travel and camping
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for a few upcoming trips and rent camping at lakes. At home, I use a Proper Pillow nightly, and am a side and stomach sleeper. and wanted to find something travel size that wouldn’t be too high in loft but still supportive, and could be rolled and packed in a carry on for air travel. It’s a little lower in loft than my regular pillow, and the perfect side. It’s perfect for back sleepers - I would give it 5 stars if that applied to me. It’s a little softer in support than I am used to, but if I sleep only on my stomach it is perfect and doesn’t hurt my neck. It rolls up in the travel bag it comes with, which is just what I wanted. Overall, I’m pleased with it for the price point and the purpose for which I bought it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought several travel pillows - all memory foam - and this was the best one. It is the perfect size, has good support and nice comfy memory foam. I've found all memory foam has a smell initially and this pillow was no exception. I had to air it out for a couple of months before I could use it but that's normal for me - I'm very sensitive to chemical smells in furniture, clothing, bedding, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have some hip pain and was told to try sleeping with a pillow between my knees. The bow shaped one made my knees hurt and it forces you to sleep with your legs exactly stacked. A regular pillow is too big, needs regular adjustments, and hard to turn over with. This one solves all those issues and it's helping my hip pain. I'm sure I'll sleep better when traveling with this pillow, too! Since it compresses, I might even get another because hotel pillows always suck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The pillow is soft
reviews.reviewText: The pillow is soft and seems easy enough to roll up small for travel, but I didn’t get the bag that I was under the impression it came with between the reviews and pictures. I did buy this specific one because it was supposed to come with the bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something small to use along with my large sleeping pillows. Sometimes you just need a little more of 'something' to lean your head or neck on. I currently use travel U-shape pillows to add a little extra support and comfort however, that wasn't doing it for me. I decided to try this little memory foam/rectangle shape pillow. BINGO! This is perfect for my needs. I love how it easily molds as needed, or springs back to its original shape. Here is the bonus for me - the small bag it comes with serves as an excellent carryon when flying. It has a strap on the carrying case to adhere to your carry-on luggage. very handy. I typically get a window seat so this pillow should work perfectly against the wall of the plane. The U-shaped travel pillows don't work for that. Excellent price too!

reviews.reviewTitle: Just the best camping pillow period
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a few different pillows because my partner and I like different pillows, and I was immediately envious of her choice of this pillow.I was skeptical that the foam would inflate really thin, or lose shape quickly, or any number of things, but none of those problems are here.This pillow is oh so soft, it's cliche, but it's pretty much like putting your cheek on a cloud. To put a fine point on it, it really is just as good as my feather down pillow at home.It's wide for a camping pillow, so you can turn and still be on it. It's the right thickness for a wide-shouldered side sleeper like myself. It doesn't overheat my head or ear. It packs up smaller than my other backpacking pillows. It's lighter than one of my other backpacking pillows. It didn't take all day to self-inflate, maybe 10 minutes or half an hour to max it out. The stuff pack it comes with is tight, but nice and small and seems respectable quality.Look, if you want a backpacking pillow and still want to actually be comfortable like me, spend the roughly 5 dollars more and carry the extra 2 ounces of weight, I promise you will be glad to be rid of the money and carry the weight. You'll know as soon as it arrives this thing rocks.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ok aber die guten Rezensionen nicht nachvollziehbar
reviews.reviewText: Leider hatte ich hohe Erwartungen durch die vielen positiven Rezensionen. Aber leider wurde ich eher enttäuscht, da das Kissen für diesen Preis eher eine minderwertige Qualität hat. Warum es so teuer ist, kann ich nicht verstehen. Das Innenleben wirkt wie billiger Schaumstoff oder ähnliches. Das Kissen ist sehr flach und bietet nicht die Stützfunktion, die ich brauche. Das Kissen geht daher zurück.
I am not allowed to say why I'm not happy! Disappointed all round however!!!!!!.... Do not buy!
Love this small travel pillow. It's compact and comfortable. It's easy to clean as you can remove the liner and put it in the washer.

Great size for travelling. Pretty comfortable as well. Love that it rolls up and fits into the carrying pouch. Just wish they had a pillow cover that fits this size. Standard pillow cover will work but you’ll need to fold in 1/2 to make it fit.
